name: Digest
tagline: Digest - a lightweight RSS reader, fork of Brief
body:
### Digest

Digest is a lightweight RSS reader extension for Firefox.
It is a fork of Brief by Adam Kowalczyk (brief.mozdev.org,
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/brief/).
The aim of this fork is to make the addon compatible with Firefox 21+
and possibly make future improvements.

Digest is released under MPL 2.0, which is an upgrade from
Brief's MPL 1.1.

The latest release is Digest 1.0.3 (2013-06-21)

Issues and pull requests are welcome.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
